name: Unique Studio in South Boston w/ Concierge + Gym
description:
Welcome to The West Square Apartments in South Boston. In this part of town, you can get a glimpse of both historical and trendy Boston. You'll find old-school taverns and modern gastropubs within walking distance, as well as dining and shopping options in the nearby and hip Seaport neighborhood. Popular activities include waterfront jogging, picknicking on Castle Island, and making a day of it at The Institute of Contemporary Art.  This community is just a 10-minute walk from the MBTA Red Line and a 7-Minute drive from the Boston Logan Int'l Airport.

Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 2950+ reviews (see below).

The space
At Zeus, we offer thoughtfully furnished homes for 30+ day stays.
